  • java.lang.Object

    Serializable, org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission

    public class AclPermission
extends org.springframework.security.acls.domain.AbstractPermission
    Redefined instance of BasePermission to avoid confusion with the Permission from UserModule.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
